meanings.definition: Different kinds, types, or forms of something.
meanings.sent1: The garden center offers a wide selection of varieties of flowers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed trying different varieties of ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, there were so many varieties of sandwiches to choose from!
meanings.sent4: The library is a treasure trove of varieties of books waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The market displayed a colorful array of varieties of fruits and vegetables.

meanings.definition: A collection of diverse items or elements.
meanings.sent1: The gift basket contained a variety of chocolates and candies.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit showcased a variety of artifacts from different time periods.
meanings.sent3: Her wardrobe was a delightful variety of colors and styles.
meanings.sent4: The buffet offered a variety of dishes to please every palate.
meanings.sent5: The festival featured a variety of performances, from music to dance.
